name: Community Project Funding Congressionally Directed Spending
objective: Community Project Funding is made available in amounts specified by Congress to assist in financing projects specified by Congress.

results.description: Congress directed spending for 80 projects ranging from $250,000 to $5,000,0000, totaling $200,798,267 in FY 2022.
Congress directed spending for 140 projects ranging from $92,000 to $6,400,000, totaling $206M, in FY 2024.

rules_regulations:

•  TIP/STIP (§§ 5303-5304)
•  Bus testing (§5318)
